Download participant data¶

You will download an encrypted ukb12345.enc file. This needs to be decrypted using the key provided by UK Biobank in an email e.g. for research application 6789 and copy number 12345 we would decrypt to an ‘unpacked’ file: .. code-block:

./helpers/linux_tools/ukb_unpack path_to_data/ukb12345.enc k6789r12345.key
output = path_to_data/ukb12345.enc_ukb

Specific fields of interest can be extracted from the .enc_ukb file (see main repo).

ukb_download_and_prep_template
